resources.string: This app allow you interact with a common error in eventual connectivity.
The antipattern Phantom Behavior will be show here, with its sub-antipatterns
There is an “apparent” execution of a process/task (reported via notification, dialog, message, etc.), however, there is no real execution of the task.
The progress notification keeps stucked when the connection to internet is off. It seems like the content is being loaded, but the progress notification is blocked
